sn45.22:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you wholesome and unwholesome qualities.
sn45.22:4.6: wrong view, wrong motivation, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong samādhi.
